reviewText:
This appears to be an edited version of a very spicy soft-core flick.  This DVD only appears to be 73 minutes long, while the version I saw on Cinemax was 88 minutes long.
Needless to say, I haven't picked this up and am still waiting for an unrated version to come out at the proper film length.
Very nice and lengthy scenes, with the popular Susan Featherly, who goes under the name Jen Dike here and looks like supermodel Elle Macpherson.  A couple of other hardcore stars appear here, such as Lauren Montgomery and April Flowers, who goes under the name Diana Espen for her softcore appearances.
If you want the full, unedited cut, avoid this DVD version.
